title: baby2020
author: baby2020
content: There is no way  you will be broke with proper Defi and research knowledge BUT WHY YOU STILL A BROKE PERSON?The secret to Defi TradingThe secret to defi trading is that there are no secretsbut despite that, a simple methodology can work. keep it simple,embrace your emotions and knowyou can be wrong quite often when it comes to research, there are so many ways to do it and we have to do our own research  but today, i will be showing you and OLD yet GOLDEN and BETTER way to research CONVENTIONAL 7 POINT STRATEVGY1]EXPLORING SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS[ X, TELEGRAM, YOUTUBE2] ANALYZING UPCOMING EVENTS3]RESEARCH THE FUNDAMENTALS 4]DISCOVER TRENDING TOPICS 5]UTILIZE THE POWER OF THE NICHE FORUMS6]ATTEND CRYPTO MEETINGS7]OBSERVE TRANSACTIONS VOLUME AND MANY MORE

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: If you are talking about classic trading, then modern DeFi platforms are not as functional as modern crypto exchanges. But DeFi platforms allow you to avoid using custodial intermediaries and manage your money yourself. Although all smart contracts have risks of hacking.
